name: StuntFail
description:
StuntFail is a Ragdoll game! This project was famous on my YT channel and it's from 2017 when i was learning about Unreal Engine and put all assets in just one project, i just got a lot to do, at that time... in terms of school and job, so i decide to not finished the project and years after i deleted all files, since it was too big for my HD and a mess in terms of logic. 

In December of 2020 i try to reach 1000 subs in Youtube so since StuntFail was the most viewed videos in my channel, i decided to rebuild the Demo and share with everyone.
